comments.en: 4 cartridges: one for each colour of CMYK. Also 4 replaceable printheads.

With HP's "hpijs" this printer can be used as a printer of the old DeskJet 900 series (DeskJet 970C and alike), but the photo mode is not supported.

The best output one gets with HP's HPIJS with the patches from Matthias Bunte and Richard Spencer-Smith ("hpijs-rss"). The GIMP-Print driver also works (Model setting: "pcl-900").

300x300 and 600x600 works, all print quality settings work, compressions work.

This is a very fast printer; probably 3x as fast as typical inkjets.

Output is very good quality - 30 to 45 sec for a page with a 6x6in photo and text.

Variants include Cse, Cxi, CN (network).
